eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Unsolicited petition on Re-enlistment of former Police forum members into Police Service (Mr M Qongqo) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 20).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa emalunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo olungacelwanga elingokuqeshwa kwabo babe ngaMapolisa kumazwe ayesakuba ngamaphandle kwiNkonzo yaMapolisa oMzantsi Afrika (uMnu M Qongqo) (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 26 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa emalunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (olungeniswe nguNks H Ismail, iLungu lePalamente) kunye noXwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (olungeniswe nguNks H Ismail, iLungu lePalamente) (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 26 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition of Mr Cornelius Basson (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 10).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa emalunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo lukaMnu Cornelius Basson (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 26 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 10).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 4).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa emalunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKempton Park, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki enkulu ethe gqolo yokungabonakali kwamapolisa ekuhlaleni kunye nokunqongophala kwezithuthi zamapolisa kwisikhululo samapolisa saseKempton Park (olungeniswe nguMnu M Waters, iLungu lePalamente) (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 26 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 4).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uNks H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBredell, ePomona, eBrentwood Park kunye naseGlen Marais (kwaWadi 25), kwisiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki yokufadalala kweenkqubo zokuhambisa umbane kwiindawo zabo (uNks H Ismail) - (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseGermiston, Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima kombane eGermiston (uNks M Clarke) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMashishini kaRhulumente – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) sokuBambisana ngokuSebenziswa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lemiThombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
xho: UMqulu wase-Afrika wezeNkcukacha-manani (Uthiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Uthunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano soBuhlobo kunye neNtsebenziswano (i-TAC) noMzantsi-Mpuma Asia (sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yoBudlelwane naMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla wama-26 kweyoKwindla 2020 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla we-11 kweyeSilimela 2020 - sivunywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeSilimela 2020). (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-29 kweyeSilimela 2020).

xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweSicelo sokuVunywa yiPalamente kwesiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) malunga nokusekwa kweCandelo  le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) kwiRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika ngokwecandelo 231(2) loMgaqo-siseko, we-1996 (iNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi nobuChwepheshe, funda Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 5 kweyoMnga 2019, iphepha 73).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2019/20 First Quarter financial and service delivery performance report of Department of Higher Education and Training (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 64).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi nobuChwepheshe yengxelo engoMsebenzi weKota yokuQala yezeMali nokuhanjiswa kweenkonzo liSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 5 kweyoMnga 2019, iphepha 64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on National Student Financial Aid Scheme 2018/19 financial and service delivery performance (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 52).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi nobuChwepheshe yomsebenzi weSikimu seSizwe soNcedo ngezeMali sikaZwelonke 2018/19 yezemali kunye nokuhanjiswa kwenkonzo (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 5 kweyoMnga 2019, iphepha 52).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2018/19 Annual Reports of National Skills Fund and Sector Education and Training Authorities (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 24).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi nobuChwepheshe yeeNgxelo zoNyaka-mali wama-2018/19 zeNgowama-mali yeSizwe yeZakhono kunye nooGunyaziwe bamaCandelo ezeMfundo noQeqesho (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 5 kweyoMnga 2019, iphepha 24).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoRhwebo noShishino engoMsebenzi wezeziMali nongengowaMali weKota yeSibini yonyaka-mali wowama-2019/20 weSebe lezoRhwebo noShishino kunye nelezoPhuhliso lwezoQoqosho (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 5 kweyoMnga 2019, iphepha 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti esisiGxina yoMphicothi-zincwadi- Jikelele malunga neNgxelo yoNyaka eHlangeneyo yoMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele kunyaka-mali wowama-2018/19 (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 4 kweyoMnga 2019, iphepha 3).

xho: IZIHLOMELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
xho: AMAXWEBHU EZIKHALAZO ATHUNYELWE KWIIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseGermiston, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseBoksburg, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKempton Park, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki enkulu ethe gqolo yokungabonakali kwamapolisa ekuhlaleni kunye nokunqongophala kwezithuthi zamapolisa kwisikhululo samapolisa saseKempton Park (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa– iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Alberton, apho bacela iNdlu iphande ukuba ingaba abantu bayithathile na inxaxheba kwaye eli phulo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu e-Alberton licetywayo lisemthethweni kusini na (uMnu D Bergman) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWidso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.

eng: Petition from the residents of Dryharts village, calling on the Assembly to investigate the re-opening of the Molehabangwe Middle School (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Basic Education – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali belali i-Dryharts, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ivule kwakhona isikolo iMolehabangwe Middle School (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeMfundo esiSiseko – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBredell, ePomoma, eBrentwood Park kunye naseGlen Marais (kwawadi 25), kwisiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki yokufadalala kweenkqubo zokuhambisa umba kwiindawo zabo (uNks H Ismail) - (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Mr H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, becala iNdlu ukuba iphandle malunga nerente ephezulu ehlawulwa ngabaqeshi beeflethi eziphantsi kolawulo lwebhunga (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeNtlalo yoLuntu, lezaManzi noGutyulo lwelindle – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseWadi 37, e-Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukuhlalwa ngokungekho-mthethweni kwistandi 1/1224 nombolo 42, eSecond Avenue, e-Alberton North (uMnu D Bergman) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli kunye neKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
xho: ISivumelwano sokusekwa kweZiko lezobuNzululwazi ngeeNkwenkwezi eliSiza esiyiKhilomitha uBude nobuBanzi (i-SKA) (Ethiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezoBunzulwazi nezobuChwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngowesi-8 kweyeDwarha 2019 – savunywa ngomhla we-6 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwephetshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla we-19 kweyoMdumba 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Esithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla we-5 kweyoMnga 2019) (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente weFederative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga nokuBuyiselwa kwaBantu abaneTyala kuMazwe Abo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019) (eNCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama- 30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga noNcedo oluFanayo kwezoMthetho kwiMiba yezoPhulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019) (eNCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: Isivumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) ngokuSebenzisa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMithombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: MOTIONS:
xho: IZIPHAKAMISO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House extends the deadline by which the Ad Hoc Committee to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution has to complete its task to 30 May 2020.
xho: Isisombululo esiyilwayo (uMbhexeshi oyiNtloko weQela elisiSininzi): Ukuba le Ndlu yandise ixesha lokuphelelwa apho iKomiti yeXeshana iza kuqalisa kwaye yazise umthetho ihlomela icandelo lama-25 loMgaqo-siseko kufuneka igqibe umsebenzi wayo ukuya kuma ngoMhla wama-29 kuCanzibe wowama-2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House revives the Aquaculture Development Bill [B 22 - 2018] (National Assembly –sec 76) and resumes proceedings on the Bill from the stage it reached on the last day of the sixth session of the Fifth Parliament.
xho: Isisombululo esiyilwayo (uMbhexeshi oyiNtloko weQela elisiSininzi): Ukuba leNdlu ihlaziye uMthetho oYilwayo woPhuhliso lokuFuya nokulima izinto eziPhila emanzini [B 22 - 2018] (iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe – icandelo lama-76) ize iqalise ukuqhuba malunga ngalo mthetho uYilwayo kwibakala efikelele kulo ngomhla wokugqibela weseshini yesithandandathu yePalamente yeSihlanu.

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
xho: IMIBA YOSUKU:

eng: Debate in terms of Rule 130: The Coronavirus and the readiness of South Africa to deal with the pandemic – (Ms S Gwarube).
xho: Ingxoxo ngokoMthetho we-130: ICoronavirus nokulungela koMzantsi Afrika ukumelana nale nyhikityha yesifo – (uNks S Gwarube).

xho: Umba wengxoxo (uMnu G G Mpumza): Ukuxhaswa kooRhulumente baMakhaya ukwenzela ulawulo olululo.

eng: APPENDIXES
xho: IZIHLOMELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
xho: AMAXWEBHU EZIKHALAZO ATHUNYELWE KWIIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseGermiston, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseBoksburg, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKempton Park, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki enkulu ethe gqolo yokungabonakali kwamapolisa ekuhlaleni kunye nokunqongophala kwezithuthi zamapolisa kwisikhululo samapolisa saseKempton Park (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa– iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Alberton, apho bacela iNdlu iphande ukuba ingaba abantu bayithathile na inxaxheba kwaye eli phulo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu e-Alberton licetywayo lisemthethweni kusini na (uMnu D Bergman) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWidso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBredell, ePomoma, eBrentwood Park kunye naseGlen Marais (kwawadi 25), kwisiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki yokufadalala kweenkqubo zokuhambisa umba kwiindawo zabo (uMnu H Ismail) - (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, becala iNdlu ukuba iphandle malunga nerente ephezulu ehlawulwa ngabaqeshi beeflethi eziphantsi kolawulo lwebhunga (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeNtlalo yoLuntu, lezaManzi noGutyulo lwelindle – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseWadi 37, e-Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukuhlalwa ngokungekho-mthethweni kwistandi 1/1224 nombolo 42, eSecond Avenue, e-Alberton North (uMnu D Bergman) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli kunye neKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano sokusekwa kweZiko lezobuNzululwazi ngeeNkwenkwezi eliSiza esiyiKhilomitha uBude nobuBanzi (i-SKA) (Ethiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezoBunzulwazi nezobuChwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngowesi-8 kweyeDwarha 2019 – savunywa ngomhla we-6 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwephetshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla we-19 kweyoMdumba 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Sithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla we-5 kweyoMnga 2019) (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga nokuBuyiselwa kwaBantu abaneTyala kuMazwe Abo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoKwindla 2020) (eNCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama- 30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga noNcedo oluFanayo kwezoMthetho kwiMiba yezoPhulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoKwindla 2020) (eNCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: Isivumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) ngokuSebenzisa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMithombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseGermiston, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseBoksburg, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWidso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBredell, ePomoma, eBrentwood Park kunye naseGlen Marais (kwawadi 25), kwisiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki yokufadalala kweenkqubo zokuhambisa umba kwiindawo zabo (uMnu H Ismail) - (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, becala iNdlu ukuba iphandle malunga nerente ephezulu ehlawulwa ngabaqeshi beeflethi eziphantsi kolawulo lwebhunga (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeNtlalo yoLuntu, lezaManzi noGutyulo lwelindle – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano sokusekwa kweZiko lezobuNzululwazi ngeeNkwenkwezi eliSiza esiyiKhilomitha uBude nobuBanzi (i-SKA) (Ethiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezoBunzulwazi nezobuChwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngowesi-8 kweyeDwarha 2019 – savunywa ngomhla we-6 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwephetshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla we-19 kweyoMdumba 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Sithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla we-5 kweyoMnga 2019) (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga nokuBuyiselwa kwaBantu abaneTyala kuMazwe Abo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoKwindla 2020) (eNCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama- 30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga noNcedo oluFanayo kwezoMthetho kwiMiba yezoPhulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoKwindla 2020) (eNCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: Isivumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) ngokuSebenzisa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMithombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019.

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
xho: AMAXWEBHU EZIKHALAZO ATHUNYELWE KWIIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseGermiston, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseBoksburg, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKempton Park, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki enkulu ethe gqolo yokungabonakali kwamapolisa ekuhlaleni kunye nokunqongophala kwezithuthi zamapolisa kwisikhululo samapolisa saseKempton Park (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa– iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Alberton, apho bacela iNdlu iphande ukuba ingaba abantu bayithathile na inxaxheba kwaye eli phulo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu e-Alberton licetywayo lisemthethweni kusini na (uMnu D Bergman) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Sithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla we-5 kweyoMnga 2019) – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga nokuBuyiselwa kwaBantu abaneTyala kuMazwe Abo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoKwindla 2020) – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama- 30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga noNcedo oluFanayo kwezoMthetho kwiMiba yezoPhulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoKwindla 2020 – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020)  (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: Isivumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) ngokuSebenzisa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMithombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngoNcedo lwezoMthetho kwiMiba eNxulumente noLwaphulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla wesi-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika noRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi ye-United Mexican States ngokuBuyiselwa koMntu Onetyala kwiLizwe Lakubo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla wesi-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
xho: UMqulu wase-Afrika wezeNkcukacha-manani (Uthiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Uthunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo ngomhla wesi-9 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano soBuhlobo kunye neNtsebenziswano (iTAC) kwiSouth East Asia (sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyoKwindla 2020) (eNA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yoBudlelwane naMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla wama-26 kweyoKwindla 2020).

xho: IMIBA YOSUKU:

eng: Introduction – Adjustments Appropriation Bill [B 10 – 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 77) and tabling of Division of Revenue Amendment Bill [B 9 – 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 76) – (Minister of Finance).
xho: Ukwaziswa – uMthetho oYilwayo woHlenga-hlengiso loLwabiwo-mali [B 10 – 2020] (iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho – icandelo elicetywayo lama-77) kunye nokuthiwa thaca koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo woLwabiwo lweNgeniso [B 9 – 2020] (iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho – icandelo elicetywayo lama-76) – (uMphathiswa wezeziMali).

eng: Introduction – Disaster Management Tax Relief Bill [B 11 – 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 77) and tabling of Disaster Management Tax Relief Administration Bill [B 12 – 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 75) – (Minister of Finance).
xho: Ukwaziswa – uMthetho oYilwayo weSaphulelo seRhafu yoLawulo lweNtlekele [B 11 – 2020] (iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho – icandelo elicetywayo lama-77) kunye nokuthiwa thaca koMthetho oYilwayo wokuBalwa kweSaphulelo seRhafu yoLawulo lweNtlekele [B 12 – 2020] (iNdlu yowiso-mthetho – icandelo elicetywayo lama-75) – (uMphathiwa wezeziMali).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Western Cape (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 4).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeSebe lezoRhwebo noShishino malunga notyelelo loLongamelo eNtshona Koloni (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeKomiti, 23 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Notices determining remuneration of Public Protector and Commissioners of South African Human Rights Commission with effect from 1 April 2019 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 15).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko malunga neZaziso ezimisela umvuzo woMkhuseli woLuntu kunye nabaKomishinala beKhomishoni yamaLungelooLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika ukususela kumhla woku-1 kuCanzibe 2019 (Isaziso, iiNgxelo zeKomiti, 22 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 15)

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti eHlangeneyo esiSigxina engoKhuselo malunga neeLeta ezisuka kuMongameli ezingokuQeshwa koMkhosi woKhuselo weSizwe woMzantsi Afrika eMozambique Channel, kwiDemocratic Republic of Congo, ukuya kwiSixeko iWuhan kwiPhondo iHubei leRiphabhliki yaBantu baseChina, kwanokuxhasa iiNkonzo zaMapolisa oMzantsi Afrika kunye namaSebe kaRhulumente (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 19 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) and Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 167).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli malunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBoksburg, kumasipala ombaxa i-Ekurhuleni, becela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (eyangeniswa nguMnu M Waters, iLungu lePalamente) kunye noXwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseGermiston, kumasipala ombaxa i-Ekurhuleni, becela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (eyangeniswa nguMnu M Waters, iLungu lePalamente)  (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 18 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 167).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 166).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli engoXwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Alberton, apho bacela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukubangaba uluntu luyithathile na inxaxheba kweli phulo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu e-Alberton licetywayo nokuba eli phulo lisemthethweni kusini na (ingeniswe nguMnu D Bergman, iLungu lePalamente) (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 18 kweyeSilimela 2019, iphepha 166).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition relating to Glen Marais Sub-Station Fire Incident under City of Ekurhuleni (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 163).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli malunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo olubhekiselele kwiSehlo seSikhululo esiphantsi kwesinye soMlilo iGlen Marais phantsi kweSixeko i-Ekurhuleni (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 163).

xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli malunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo  oluvela kubahlali baseWadi 37, e-Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukuhlalwa ngokungekho-mthethweni kwistandi 1/1224 nombolo 42, eSecond Avenue, e-Alberton North (eyangeniswa nguMnu D Bergman, iLungu lePalamente) (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 160).

eng: APPENDIXES
xho: IZIHLOMELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
xho: AMAXWEBHU EZIKHALAZO ATHUNYELWE KWIIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKempton Park, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki enkulu ethe gqolo yokungabonakali kwamapolisa ekuhlaleni kunye nokunqongophala kwezithuthi zamapolisa kwisikhululo samapolisa saseKempton Park (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
