eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Sithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoMnga 2019) – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngaso ngomhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) sokuBambisana ngokuSebenziswa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lemiThombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngokuNcedisana ngezoMthetho kwiMiba eNxulumente noLwaphulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020) – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela 2020.

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika noRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi ye-United Mexican States ngokuBuyiselwa koMntu Onetyala kwiLizwe Lakubo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla woku-1 kweyoKwindla 2020 ).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
xho: UMqulu wase-Afrika wezeNkcukacha-manani (Uthiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Uthunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano soBuhlobo kunye neNtsebenziswano (i-TAC) noMzantsi-Mpuma Asia (sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yoBudlelwane naMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla wama-26 kweyoKwindla 2020 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla we-11 kweyeSilimela 2020 - sivunywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeSilimela 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
xho: IZIPHAKAMISO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 27 on the election of temporary presiding officer, elects Mr Q R Dyantyi and Ms T Mahambehlala to act as temporary presiding officers in the chamber during hybrid sittings of the National Assembly, as and when necessary, for the duration of the 2020 annual session.
xho: Isisombululo esiyilwayo (uMbhexeshi oyiNtloko weQela elisisiNinzi): Ukuba le Ndlu, ingekuba idelela uMgaqo 27 omalunga nokonyulwa kwegosa elongameleyo lethutyana, yonyule uMnu Q R Dyantyi kunye noNks T Mahambehlala ukuba babambele njengamagosa ongameleyo ethutyana kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ngethuba lezi ndibano zingafaniyo nezesiqhelo zeNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe, xa kukho imfuneko, ide iphele leseshoni yonyaka wama-2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House –
xho: Isisombululo esiyilwayo (uMbhexeshi oyiNtloko weQela elisisiNinzi): Ukuba le Ndlu –

eng: notes that –
xho: iqaphele ukuba –

eng: on 25 July 2019 an Ad Hoc Committee to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution was established and mandated to complete its task and report to the House by 31 March 2020;
xho: ngomhla wama-25 kweyeKhala 2019 iKomiti yeThutyana eza kusungula ize ingenise umthetho owenza izilungiso kwicandelo 25 loMgaqo-siseko yasekwa yaze yagunyaziswa ukuba igqibezele umsebenzi wayo ize inike ingxelo kule Ndlu ngomhla wama-31 kweyoKwindla 2020;

eng: on 5 March 2020, the Assembly extended the deadline for reporting to 29 May 2020;
xho: ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020, iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yaye yalandisa ixesha ebelisekelwe ukunika ingxelo laya kutsho kumhla wama-29 kuCanzibe 2020;

eng: the Ad Hoc Committee ceased to exist on 29 May 2020 before it could complete its mandate;
xho: le Komiti yeThutyana ibhangiswe ngomhla wama-29 kuCanzibe 2020 phambi kokuba iwugqibe umsebenzi wayo ibiwugunyazisiwe.

eng: re-establishes the Ad Hoc to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution with the same composition and powers as its predecessor (Minutes of Proceedings, 25 July 2019, p 68);
xho: iphinde iseke iKomiti yeThutyana eza kusungula ize ingenise umthetho oza kwenza izilungiso kwicandelo 25 loMgaqo-siseko eyakheke ngolwaa hlobo lunye futhi nenamagunya afanayo nawale yangaphambili (Imizuzu yeNtlanganiso, owama-25 kweyeKhala 2019, iphepha 68);

eng: instructs the Committee to incorporate in its work the proceedings and all the work of the previous committee up to and including 29 May 2020; and
xho: iyalele le Komiti ukuba kumsebenzi wayo ifake iingxelo kunye nawo wonke omnye umsebenzi wala komiti yangaphambili uza kutsho kumhla wama-29 kuCanzibe 2020, kuquka nomsebenzi walo mhla; ize

eng: sets the deadline by which the Committee is to report to 31 December 2020.
xho: ibeke umhla wama-31 kweyoMnga 2020 njengomhla ekufuneka le Komiti inike ngawo ingxelo.

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
xho: IMIBA YOSUKU:

eng: Debate in terms of Rule 130: The scourge of gender-based violence against women and femicide – (Ms N V Mente).
xho: Ingxoxo-mpikiswano ngokoMgaqo 130: Ukwanda ngokugqithisileyo kobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini obenziwa kumanina kunye nokubalawa kwamanina – (uNks N V Mente).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Notices determining remuneration of Public Protector and Commissioners of South African Human Rights Commission with effect from 1 April 2019 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 15).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko malunga neZaziso ezimisela umvuzo woMkhuseli woLuntu kunye nabaKomishinala beKhomishoni yamaLungelo oLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika ukususela kumhla woku-1 kuCanzibe 2019 (Isaziso, iiNgxelo zeKomiti, 22 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) and Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 167).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli malunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBoksburg, kumasipala ombaxa i-Ekurhuleni, becela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (eyangeniswa nguMnu M Waters, iLungu lePalamente) kunye noXwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseGermiston, kumasipala ombaxa i-Ekurhuleni, becela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (eyangeniswa nguMnu M Waters, iLungu lePalamente)  (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 18 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 167).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 166).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli engoXwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Alberton, apho bacela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukubangaba uluntu luyithathile na inxaxheba kweli phulo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu e-Alberton licetywayo nokuba eli phulo lisemthethweni kusini na (ingeniswe nguMnu D Bergman, iLungu lePalamente) (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 18 kweyeSilimela 2019, iphepha 166).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition relating to Glen Marais Sub-Station Fire Incident under City of Ekurhuleni (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 163).

xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli malunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo  oluvela kubahlali baseWadi 37, e-Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukuhlalwa ngokungekho-mthethweni kwistandi 1/1224 nombolo 42, eSecond Avenue, e-Alberton North (eyangeniswa nguMnu D Bergman, iLungu lePalamente) (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 18 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 160).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition pertaining to Service Delivery in Nemallpius Ext 22, under City of Tshwane (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 157).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli malunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo olubhekiselele ekuHanjisweni kweeNkonzo e-Nemallpius Ext 22, phantsi kweSixeko saseTshwane (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 18 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 157

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Petition from the residents of Dryharts village, calling on the Assembly to investigate the re-opening of the Molehabangwe Middle School (submitted by Mr I S Seitlholo, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 38).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa emalunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (olungeniswe nguNks H Ismail, iLungu lePalamente) kunye noXwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (olungeniswe nguNks H Ismail, iLungu lePalamente) (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 26 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 15).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uNks H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBredell, ePomoma, eBrentwood Park kunye naseGlen Marais (kwaWadi 25), kwisiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki yokufadalala kweenkqubo zokuhambisa umbane kwiindawo zabo (uNks H Ismail) - (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphandle malunga nerente ephezulu ehlawulwa ngabaqeshi beeflethi eziphantsi kolawulo lwebhunga (uNks H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa koLuntu, lezaManzi noGutyulo lwelindle – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Sithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoMnga 2019) – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngaso ngomhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) sokuBambisana ngokuSebenziswa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lemiThombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngokuNcedisana ngezoMthetho kwiMiba eNxulumente noLwaphulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020) – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela 2020.)

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika noRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi ye-United Mexican States ngokuBuyiselwa koMntu Onetyala kwiLizwe Lakubo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla woku-1 kweyoKwindla 2020 ).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
xho: UMqulu wase-Afrika wezeNkcukacha-manani (Uthiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Uthunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020) .
xho: IsiVumelwano soBuhlobo kunye neNtsebenziswano (i-TAC) noMzantsi-Mpuma Asia (sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yoBudlelwane naMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla wama-26 kweyoKwindla 2020 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla we-11 kweyeSilimela 2020 - sivunywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeSilimela 2020).

xho: IZIHLOMELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
xho: AMAXWEBHU EZIKHALAZO ATHUNYELWE KWIIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKempton Park, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki enkulu ethe gqolo yokungabonakali kwamapolisa ekuhlaleni kunye nokunqongophala kwezithuthi zamapolisa kwisikhululo samapolisa saseKempton Park (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (u H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (u H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (u H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBredell, ePomoma, eBrentwood Park kunye naseGlen Marais (kwaWadi 25), kwisiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki yokufadalala kweenkqubo zokuhambisa umba kwiindawo zabo (u H Ismail) - (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphandle malunga nerente ephezulu ehlawulwa ngabaqeshi beeflethi eziphantsi kolawulo lwebhunga (u H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe l oLuntu, lezaManzi noGutyulo lwelindle – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Sithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoMnga 2019) – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngaso ngomhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) sokuBambisana ngokuSebenziswa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lemiThombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngokuNcedisana ngezoMthetho kwiMiba eNxulumente noLwaphulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020) – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela 2020.)

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika noRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi ye-United Mexican States ngokuBuyiselwa koMntu Onetyala kwiLizwe Lakubo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla woku-1 kweyoKwindla 2020 ).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
xho: UMqulu wase-Afrika wezeNkcukacha-manani (Uthiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Uthunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano soBuhlobo kunye neNtsebenziswano (i-TAC) noMzantsi-Mpuma Asia (sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yoBudlelwane naMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla wama-26 kweyoKwindla 2020 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla we-11 kweyeSilimela 2020 - sivunywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeSilimela 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
xho: IZIPHAKAMISO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House –
xho: Izisombululo eziyilwayo (uMbhexeshi oyiNtloko weQela elisisiNinzi): Ukuba le Ndlu –

eng: notes that the term of office of the Auditor-General is due to end on 30 November 2020;
xho: iqaphele ukuba ixesha lokuphatha koMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele liza kuphela ngomhla wama-30 kweyeNkanga 2020;

eng: establishes in terms of Rule 253(1)(a) an ad hoc committee on the appointment of the Auditor-General, the Committee to –
xho: imisele ngokoMgaqo 253(1)(a) ikomiti yethutyana eza kuqasha uMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele, yona le Komiti –

eng: nominates a person in terms of section 193 of the Constitution for appointment as Auditor-General;
xho: yonyule umntu ngokwecandelo 193 loMgago-siseko elingokuqashwa koMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele;

eng: consist of 11 members of the National Assembly, as follows: ANC 6, DA 2, EFF 1, and other parties 2;
xho: ibe namalungu ali-11 aphuma kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe, aza kwanyulwa ngolu hlobo: awe-ANC abe ma-6, awe-DA abe ma-2, ele-EFF libe li-1, ize eminye imibutho imelwe ngama-2;

eng: exercise those powers in Rule 167 necessary to assist it in carrying out its task; and
xho: isebenzise amagunya ayo acaciswe kuMgaqo 167 afunekayo ukuyinceda ukuze yenze lo msebenzi; ize

eng: report to the House on the nomination of the Auditor-General by 31 August 2020.
xho: inike ingxelo eNdlini ngomhla wama-31 kweyeThupha 2020 malunga nenkqubo yokonyula umntu oza kuba nguMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 138(2), which provides for rotation of clusters for Questions to Ministers on a weekly basis as determined by the Rules Committee, mandates the National Assembly Programme Committee to make decisions regarding the combination of clusters of government portfolios and the rotation of clusters based on the determination of priorities as and when necessary for the duration of the 2020 annual session.
xho: Isisombululo esiyilwayo (uMbhexeshi oyiNtloko weQela elisisiNinzi): Ukuba le Ndlu, nangona kukho uMgaqo 138(2), onika imvume yokuba iintlanganiselo zeMibuzo yabaPhathiswa zitshintshwe rhoqo ngeveki ngokokubona kweKomiti yemiGaqo, igunyazisa iKomiti yeeNkqubo zeNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe ukuba ithathe izigqibo ezinxulumene nendlela eziza kwakheka ngayo iintlanganisela zamasebe karhulumente kunye neziza kutshintsha-tshintshwa ngayo ngokujonga imiba ekuvunyelenweyo ukuba yengundoqo futhi ukuba kukho imfuneko ide iphele le seshoni yonyaka wowama-2020

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
xho: IMIBA YOSUKU:

eng: Consideration of First Report of National Assembly Rules Committee, 2020 (Virtual Meetings) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 2 June 2020, p 3).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kwingxelo yokuQala yeKomiti yeMiqathango yeNdlu yoWiso-Mthetho yeSizwe, 2020 (Iintlanganiso zoBuxhakaxhaka bobuChwephetshe)(  Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 2 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 3).

xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeNdalo, ezamaHlathi nezokuLoba engesiCwangciso esiQiqisisiweyo sowama-2019/20 – 2023-24, iziCwangciso zoMsebenzi woNyaka wowama-2020/21 kunye neVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali 32 yeSebe lezeNdalo, ezamaHlathi nezokuLoba (iSaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa Thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, owesi-5 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 21).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on 2020/21 Annual Performance Plans and Budgets of Department of Cooperative Governance, Department of Traditional Affairs and entities (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 June 2020, p 6).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimi yezeMveli engeziCwangciso zoMsebenzi woNyaka wowama-2020/21 kunye noHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali leSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano, olwezeSebe leMicimbi yeMveli kunye nolwezamaqumrhu (iSaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa Thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, owesi-5 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 6).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 3).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweSicelo soKwamkelwa yiPalamente isiVumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngokubuyisela umva kwimiba ekwicandelo lama-231(2) loMgaqo-siseko, wowe-1996 (Ingxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, jonga kwiZaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa Thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 29 kuCanzibe 2020, iphepha3).

xho: Isigqibo soMbuzo malunga nengxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe malunga nengxelo kanyaka-mali 2019/20 engoMsebenzi weKota yokuQala yezeMali nokuhanjiswa kweenkonzo liSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 5 kweyoMnga 2019, iphepha).

eng: APPENDIXES
xho: IZIHLOMELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
xho: AMAXWEBHU EZIKHALAZO ATHUNYELWE KWIIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseGermiston, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseBoksburg, umasipala ombaxa wase-Ekurhuleni ucela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKempton Park, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki enkulu ethe gqolo yokungabonakali kwamapolisa ekuhlaleni kunye nokunqongophala kwezithuthi zamapolisa kwisikhululo samapolisa saseKempton Park (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa– iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Alberton, apho bacela iNdlu iphande ukuba ingaba abantu bayithathile na inxaxheba kwaye eli phulo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu e-Alberton licetywayo lisemthethweni kusini na (uMnu D Bergman) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leNtsebenziswano kuLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBredell, ePomoma, eBrentwood Park kunye naseGlen Marais (kwawadi 25), kwisiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki yokufadalala kweenkqubo zokuhambisa umba kwiindawo zabo (uMnu H Ismail) - (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, becala iNdlu ukuba iphandle malunga nerente ephezulu ehlawulwa ngabaqeshi beeflethi eziphantsi kolawulo lwebhunga (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeNtlalo yoLuntu, lezaManzi noGutyulo lwelindle – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseWadi 37, e-Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ukuhlalwa ngokungekho-mthethweni kwistandi 1/1224 nombolo 42, eSecond Avenue, e-Alberton North (uMnu D Bergman) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli kunye neKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Sithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla we-5 kweyoMnga 2019) – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga nokuBuyiselwa kwaBantu abaneTyala kuMazwe Abo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoKwindla 2020) – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama- 30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yaseBangladesh malunga noNcedo oluFanayo kwezoMthetho kwiMiba yezoPhulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoKwindla 2020 – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020)  (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-30 kweyoMqungu 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: Isivumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) ngokuSebenzisa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMithombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngoNcedo lwezoMthetho kwiMiba eNxulumente noLwaphulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla wesi-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika noRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi ye-United Mexican States ngokuBuyiselwa koMntu Onetyala kwiLizwe Lakubo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla wesi-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
xho: UMqulu wase-Afrika wezeNkcukacha-manani (Uthiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Uthunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo ngomhla wesi-9 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020).
xho: Isivumelwano soBuhlobo kunye neNtsebenziswano (iTAC) kwiSouth East Asia (sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyoKwindla 2020) (eNA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yoBudlelwane naMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla wama-26 kweyoKwindla 2020).

xho: IMIBA YOSUKU:

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Notices determining remuneration of Public Protector and Commissioners of South African Human Rights Commission with effect from 1 April 2019 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 15).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko engeZaziso zokubekwa komvuzo woMkhuseli woLuntu kunye neyeeKomishinara zeKomishini yoMzantsi Afrika yamaLungelo oLuntu ukusuka ngomhla woku-1 kuTshazimpuzi 2019 (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 22 kweyeSilimela 2019, iphepha 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti eHlangeneyo esiSigxina engoKhuselo malunga neeLeta ezisuka kuMongameli ezingokuQeshwa koMkhosi woKhuselo weSizwe woMzantsi Afrika eMozambique Channel, kwiDemocratic Republic of Congo, ukuya kwiSixeko iWuhan kwiPhondo iHubei leRiphabhliki yaBantu baseChina, kwanokuxhasa iiNkonzo zaMapolisa oMzantsi Afrika kunye namaSebe kaRhulumente (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 19 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) and Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 167).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli malunga noXwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBoksburg, kumasipala ombaxa i-Ekurhuleni, becela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (eyangeniswa nguMnu M Waters, iLungu lePalamente) kunye noXwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseGermiston, kumasipala ombaxa i-Ekurhuleni, becela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukucima rhoqo kombane (eyangeniswa nguMnu M Waters, iLungu lePalamente)  (Isaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 18 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 167).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 166).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo ngeNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli engoXwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Alberton, apho bacela le Ndlu ukuba iphande ukubangaba uluntu luyithathile na inxaxheba kweli phulo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu e-Alberton licetywayo nokuba eli phulo lisemthethweni kusini na (ingeniswe nguMnu D Bergman, iLungu lePalamente) (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 18 kweyeSilimela 2019, iphepha 166).

eng: APPENDIXES
xho: IZIHLOMELO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
xho: AMAXWEBHU EZIKHALAZO ATHUNYELWE KWIIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKempton Park, apho bacela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki enkulu ethe gqolo yokungabonakali kwamapolisa ekuhlaleni kunye nokunqongophala kwezithuthi zamapolisa kwisikhululo samapolisa saseKempton Park (uMnu M Waters) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseWattville, eBenoni apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ishukuxe umba wokukhula kolwaphulo-mthetho, oluquka ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini kunye nobundlobongela kubantwana, futhi nesidingo sesikhululo samapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iqondo eliphezulu lolwaphulo-mthetho kunye neziyobisi, ukubonelela ngeevenkilana kwizikhululo zamapolisa kunye neenqwelo zamapolisa kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali besiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande iinkonzo zokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma ezingaqhubeki kakuhle kwindawo yabo (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBambiswano ngoLawulo neMicimbi yeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo elivela kubahlali baseKokomeng neelali ezibangqongileyo, apho bacela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba iphande ize ibeke phambili ukuvulwa kwakhona kwesikhululo samapolisa saseKokomeng (uMnu I S Seitlholo) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezaMapolisa – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali baseBredell, ePomoma, eBrentwood Park kunye naseGlen Marais (kwaWadi 25), kwisiXeko sase-Ekurhuleni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphande ingxaki yokufadalala kweenkqubo zokuhambisa umba kwiindawo zabo (uMnu H Ismail) - (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yezeMveli – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
xho: Uxwebhu lwezikhalazo oluvela kubahlali base-Actonville, eBenoni, becela iNdlu ukuba iphandle malunga nerente ephezulu ehlawulwa ngabaqeshi beeflethi eziphantsi kolawulo lwebhunga (uMnu H Ismail) – (iKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeNtlalo yoLuntu, lezaManzi noGutyulo lwelindle – iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe.

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
xho: IMITHETHO EYILWAYO ETHUNYELWE KWINKQUBO YOKUPHAWULA YEZINDLU ZOMBINI (I-JTM)

xho: UMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo wokuPhuculwa kwaMalungelo obuNini-mhlaba [B 6 - 2020] (iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe – icandelo elicetywayo lama 76).

eng: National Road Traffic Amendment Bill [B7-2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 76).
xho: UMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMithetho yeeNdlela zeSizwe [B7-2020] (iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe – icandelo elicetywayo lama 76).

eng: Transport Appeal Tribunal Amendment Bill [B8-2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 76).
xho: UMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weNkundla yeziBheno yezoThutho [B8-2020] (iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yeSizwe – icandelo elicetywayo lama 76).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
xho: IMITHETHO EYILWAYO ETHUNYELWE KWIIKOMITI

eng: Protection of State Information Bill [B 6H – 2010] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 12 June 2020, p 7) – (Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services – National Assembly).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
xho: IZIVUMELWANO ZEHLABATHI

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (i-ICGEB) esimalunga nokuSekwa kweCandelo le-International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology kwiRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika (Sithiwe thaca ngowe-18 kweyoMsintsi 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe ngowe-19 kweyoMsintsi 2019 – kwenziwa ingxelo ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoMnga 2019) – saza savunywa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 (e-NCOP: Sathunyelwa kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yezeMfundo noBuchwepheshe, iMidlalo neNkcubeko ngomhla we-19 kweyeNkanga 2019 – kwanikwa ingxelo ngaso ngomhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
xho: Ukuqinisekiswa kwesiVumelwano esiphakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yase-India, uRhulumente we-Federative Republic of Brazil kunye noRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kwiNgxowa ye-IBSA yokuPheliswa kweNtlupheko kunye neNdlala (sityikitywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2017) (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyeDwarha 2019). (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe loBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla we-22 kweyeDwarha 2019) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko noBulungisa ngomhla wama-24 kweyeDwarha 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye ne-European Atomic Energy Community (i-EURATOM) sokuBambisana ngokuSebenziswa iNyukliya kumaPhulo oXolo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-14 kweyeNkanga 2019) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lemiThombo yeziMbiwa nezaMandla ngomhla we-18 kweyeNkanga 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngokuNcedisana ngezoMthetho kwiMiba eNxulumente noLwaphulo-mthetho (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020) – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela 2020.

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano phakathi kukaRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika noRhulumente weRiphabhlikhi ye-United Mexican States ngokuBuyiselwa koMntu Onetyala kwiLizwe Lakubo (Sithiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NCOP: Sithunyelwe yiKomiti eKhethekileyo yoKhuseleko nezoBulungisa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2020 – kunikwe ingxelo ngaso ngomhla woku-1 kweyoKwindla 2020 ).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
xho: UMqulu wase-Afrika wezeNkcukacha-manani (Uthiwe thaca ngomhla wesi-5 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Uthunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo ngomhla we-9 kweyoKwindla 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020).
xho: IsiVumelwano soBuhlobo kunye neNtsebenziswano (i-TAC) noMzantsi-Mpuma Asia (sithiwe thaca ngomhla we-18 kweyoKwindla 2020) (e-NA: Sithunyelwe kwiKomiti yeMicimbi yoBudlelwane naMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano ngomhla wama-26 kweyoKwindla 2020 – sivunywe ngomhla we-17 kweyeSilimela 2020).

xho: IMIBA YOSUKU:

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities on Strategic Plan (2020-2025) and Annual Performance Plan (Budget Vote 20) of Department of Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities, Commission for Gender Equality and National Youth Development Agency for financial year 2020/21 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 June 2020, p 72).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lamaNina, uLutsha nabaNtu abaKhubazekileyo engesiCwangciso esiQiqisisiweyo (sowama-2020-2025) kunye nesiCwangciso soMsebenzi woNyaka (iVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali uNombl 20) seSebe lamaNina, uLutsha naBantu abaKhubazekileyo, iKhomishoni yoLingwano ngokweSini kunye ne-Arhente yeSizwe yoPhuhliso loLutsha sonyaka-mali wowama-2020/211 (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 9 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 72).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Home Affairs on Strategic and Annual Performance Plans and Budget of Vote 5 - Department of Home Affairs, Electoral Commission and Government Printing Works (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 10 June 2020, p 4).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe leMicimbi lezeKhaya engesiCwangciso esiQiqisisiweyo nesoMsebenzi woNyaka kunye neVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali uNombl 5 – iSebe leMicimbi yezeKhaya, iKhomishoni yoloNyulo kunye ne-Government Printing Words ((Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 10 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 4).

xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoKhuselo namaGqala oMkhosi engeVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali uNombl 23 (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 9 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 40).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Tourism on Budget Vote No 38: Tourism (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 8 June 2020, p 3).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoKhenketho engeVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali uNombl 8: Ezokhenketho (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 8 kweyeSilimela 2020, iphepha 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation on Budget Vote 41, 2020/21 Annual Performance Plans and Strategic Plans: Water and Sanitation and entities (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 8 June 2020, p 132).

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
xho: IMIBA YOSUKU

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Provisional suspension from office of Mr L T Mkansi, a Regional Magistrate, Bloemfontein, tabled in terms of section 13(3)(b) of Magistrates Act, 1993 (Act No 90 of 1993)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 4).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko  ngokuRhoxiswa okweXeshana kwi-ofisi koMnu L T Mkansi, uMantyi woMmandla, eBloemfontein, okuthiwe thaca ngokwecandelo le-13(3)(b) loMthetho weeMantyi, wowe-1993 (uMthetho onguNombl 90 wowe-1993)  (iSaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa Thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 29 kuCanzibe 2020, iphepha 4).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 4).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweSicelo soKwamkelwa yiPalamente kwesiVumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngokuNcedana ngokuFanayo kwiMiba yezoMthetho ngokwecandelo lama-231(2) loMgaqo-siseko, wowe-1996 (Ingxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, jonga kwiZaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa Thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 29 kuCanzibe 2020, iphepha 4).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 3).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweSicelo soKwamkelwa yiPalamente kwesiVumelwano phakathi koRhulumente weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika kunye noRhulumente we-United Mexican States ngokuBuyiselwa kwabaTyholwa kuMazwe Abo okuZalwa ngokwecandelo lama-231(2) loMgaqo-siseko, wowe-1996 (Ingxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, jonga kwiZaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa Thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 29 kuCanzibe 2020, iphepha3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Third Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 May 2020, p 3).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoRhwebo noShishino kuMsebenzi wezeziMali nongengoweZimali weSebe lezoRhwebo noShishino kunye noPhuhliso loQoqosho weKota yesiThathu kuNyaka-mali wama-2019/20 (iSaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa Thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 19 kuCanzibe 2020, iphepha 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on Oversight visit on pilot project for acquisition of office accommodation for South African Permanent Mission to United Nations and Consulate-General in New York, United States of America (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 16 March 2020, p 11).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezoBudlelwano naMazwe ngamazwe ngoTyelelo lokuya kuHlola iprojekthi esaqalayo yokufuna ukuthenga indawo eza kuba yi-ofisi yeZiko elisisiGxina lezoZakuzo loMzantsi Afrika kwiZizwe eziManyeneyo kunye nekaNozakuzaku oMkhulu eNew York, e-United States of America (iZaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa Thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 16 kweyoKwindla 2020, iphepha 11).

eng: Decision of Question on Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2019/20 First Quarter financial and service delivery performance report of Department of Higher Education and Training (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 64).
xho: Isigqibo soMbuzo malunga nengxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi noBuchwepheshe malunga nengxelo kanyaka-mali 2019/20 engoMsebenzi weKota yokuQala yezeMali nokuhanjiswa kweenkonzo liSebe lezeMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 5 kweyoMnga 2019, iphepha 64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department Public Service and Administration, Entities and Public Service Commission (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 30).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo kuMsebenzi woNyaka-mali wowama- 2019/20 weKota yesiBini neyesiThathu: Isebe lezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo, amaQumrhu neKomishoni yeeNkonzo zoLuntu (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 11 kweyoKwindla 2020, iphepha 30).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Statistics South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 23).
xho: Ukuqwalaselwa kweNgxelo yeKomiti yeMicimbi yeSebe lezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumene noLawulo kuMsebenzi woNyaka-mali wowama- 2019/20 weKota yesibini neyesithathu: Isebe leeNkonzo zoLuntu noLawulo, amaQumrhu neKomishoni yeeNkonzo zoLuntu: Inkcukacha-manani eMzantsi Afrika (Izaziso, iiNgxelo eziza kuthiwa thaca kunye neeNgxelo zeeKomiti, 11 kweyoKwindla 2020, iphepha 23).
